Jekyll And This

10 Feb 2015

This application was initiated as a project to learn Jekyll and Git. Building the project allowed me to familiarize with clis, using a generator, and configuring for an application server that is not Tomcat :) . It was also a stepping stone in familiarizing with Cloud9 and cloud based development environments.

Enhancements/Fixes:

  • Styling approach

Experimenting by Polly Hwu
